text: The 1906 New York Giants season was the franchise's 24th season. The team finished in second place in the National League with a 96-56 record, 20 games behind the Chicago Cubs. == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Notable transactions === * July 13, 1906: Doc Marshall and Sam Mertes were traded by the Giants to the St. Louis Cardinals for Spike Shannon.Doc Marshall page at Baseball Reference === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
